name: I Am Glob - Weekly Game Jam #65
name_original: I Am Glob - Weekly Game Jam #65
description:
Instructions on how to play are included in the game. 

This is my first ever game that I have made.  I made everything from scratch except for the sounds and the neat font, I ran out of time.   Busted out my paint skills for the buttons and some of the titles lol.  I had a lot more planned for this but as I do, I scoped way too big. In saying that though I liked having the time frame limitation, it made me finally stop playing around forever and just make something.

I had lots of fun making this I hope it is a little bit fun and challenging to play.

Don't judge me on my horrible Photoshop skills haha!!
